description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Simple but addictive 2D tennis game for 2 players. Easy to control but hard to master, find a worthy rival and you will suffer the “just one more match” syndrome. And remember to take advantage of the advanced physics and the game events.
description.short: Simple but addictive 2D tennis game for 2 players. Easy to control but hard to master, find a worthy rival and you will suffer the “just one more match” syndrome. And remember to take advantage of the advanced physics and the game events.
